channel.title: Comments on: Finding Istanbul’s perfect boutique hotel: Peradays

item.title: By: Why Turkey should be on your bucket list | Getaway Travel Blog
item.dc:creator: Why Turkey should be on your bucket list | Getaway Travel Blog
item.description: [...] a mix of ancient ruins, extravagant palaces and contemplative spiritual spaces and buzzing bars, cool boutique hotels and restaurants. My favourite way to soak up the city’s atmosphere was by sitting in rooftop bars [...]
